metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29189 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Pion DTLS is a Go implementation of Datagram Transport Layer Security.Prior to version 2.1.4, a buffer that was used for inbound network traffichad no upper limit. Pion DTLS would buffer all network traffic from theremote user until the handshake completes or timed out. An attacker couldexploit this to cause excessive memory usage. Version 2.1.4 contains apatch for this issue. There are currently no known workarounds available.

criterions.comment: pion: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
